readable.title: 2743652730_d909c7ae82
readable.content: A boy looks out the window at another boy who is spraying the window with water . A child is looking through the glass at the child squirting a water hose onto the glass . A little boy spays a hose at his brother who is on the other side of a window . One child sprays a water hose at another who is inside behind a glass window . One little boy is standing inside a house on one side of a window while another boy is outside squirting the window with a hose .
